name: Bibtastic - Click to buy!
description:
To purchase, scroll down and click the 'Add to Cart" button below!

Protect your tie and clothing from mealtime spills and look fresh all day! Keep one in your desk drawer, purse or briefcase. Rolls or folds easily. Rinse with warm water and it's good as new. 

Bibtastic "covers 17"X17" area. Can be trimmed to fit"

We ship in the continental United States only.  $2.00 flat shipping rate (USPS) up to 10 bibs. Please allow 7-10 days for delivery.  If you need express delivery or a larger quantity, please contact us.  Thank you!
